name: rustup-reminder
description: Reminds you when a new stable version of Rust is out

rustup-reminder.NotifyWhenUpToDate.markdownDescription: Whether to *also* notify you if your stable Rust version is up to date. The default is to only notify you if there is an update available.

rustup-reminder.UpdateWhenPossible.markdownDescription: Whether to automatically update your stable Rust version when an update is available. This is done by running 'rustup update -- stable' (updates the stable version and potentially rustup itself). The default is to not auto-update.

rustup-reminder.Delay.markdownDescription: Delay in milliseconds after running terminal commands. This is necessary due to technical reasons. Default is 5000. See the Performance Tuning section in the extension description to learn more.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
